LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Magnifier.label: Miho Magnifier
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Magnifier.descripti: A device that allows you to aim more accurately at a greater distance. Good for Miho with poor eyesight.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_TacticalAssist.desc: An aim-assist device equipped with trajectory calculation, friend-foe identification, and magnification functions.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Glasses.label: Miho Glasses
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Glasses.description: Glasses! They not only improve your eye-sight, they also make you look like a smart librarian.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Visor.label: Miho Visor
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Visor.description: A semi-transparent visor made of bulletproof material.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Toxmask.label: Miho Gas Mask
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Toxmask.description: A gas mask with a cyberpunk-inspired design that is enhanced with a silk filter for better filtration.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Maid.label: Miho French Maid Katyusha
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Maid.description: They probably called this a maid's headband in the Gauls region of ancient Earth, but we'll give it a pass because it's cute.
